May 16, 1999 D Leicestershire BBA (Leicester) Contest (First Section)
Leicestershire BBA (Leicester) Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Leicestershire Brass Band Association (Leicester) Contest leicester-contest-first-section
Hermitage Leisure Centre, Whitwick 6th annual contest. 5 bands competed
Dec. 15, 2012, 4:46 p.m. Feb. 5, 2017, 7:36 a.m.

2 Riddings Band John Davis
3 Ireland Colliery Chesterfield Band Roy Walters
4 Hathern Band Dave Newman Ballet for Band
